experience: You and Chrisanne both know Jennifer Bookspan, Jonathan Cottrell, and 71 others
I would like to take this moment and congratulate Stephen Lesce on his promotion to District Sales Manager of SMB Solutions in Mount Arlington, NJ.
Stephen joined Paychex SMB Solutions 9 years ago, as a Sales Rep selling

Payroll solutions to our Small Business market. Before coming to Paychex, he held roles as Sales Mentor & Trainer, Regional Director, and Vice President of Sales. He took a step back into sales to take 2 steps forward at Paychex. He was so successful as a Sales Rep that he achieved; “Conference”, District Top Salesperson, Team Top Salesperson, Diamond Club and “Elevation” Honors.

He has now decided to progress his career into Management so he can teach, mentor, coach sales reps to have the same if not more success than he had while in the field. Luckily for all of you, he has 2 openings on his team and is ready to interview. Let me know if you would like

to start the conversation and have the chance to work with not only a Top Sales Rep but a leader that truly understands what it takes to be successful with Paychex. He is ready to help you start your Paychex Story! Interviewing TODAY contact me at ecrews@paychex.com
